page.title: 18Clubs
page.content: Because of the lack of any entertainment in the area their are a lot of clubs and societies. One of the main clubs in the area is the{Young {Farmers}club at Elberton which besides giving farming demonstrations hold first aid courses and talks on law. They also hold social events and dances at Tockington. Ladies in the area have a flower arranging society at Olveston church. Their is also a mother and toddlers club at Olveston aswell. Sports are well served aswell in the area with village archery, cricket,tennis and table tennis clubs. Their is also a Youth club and and an Over sixties club at Olveston. Mr Gingell doesn't go to a club but says there is a mixed beer club nearby!!
